body: First Wave Statue Exhibit         "The First Wave" statue exhibit in the lobby of the park visitor center. Elizabeth Cady Stanton is at the far left.   Sculptor Lloyd Lillie's "The First Wave" features life-size bronze statues of the five women who organized the First Women's Rights Convention, and a few of the men who came in support of social, political, and religious equality for women.      View The First Wave brochure  page 1 (pdf 72 KB)| page 2 (pdf 45 KB)                   The First Wave   16 Photos
title: Women's Rights National Historical Park: Statues
